mapper.select: SELECT T.MEMBER_ID , REG_DATE , TEACHER_CLASS , TEACHER_NUM , WORK_CODE FROM TEACHER AS T INNER JOIN MEMBER AS M ON T.MEMBER_ID = M.MEMBER_ID ORDER BY MEMBER_NAME DESC

SELECT T.MEMBER_ID , MEMBER_NAME , MEMBER_TELL , MEMBER_EMAIL , MEMBER_ADDR , ADDR_DETAIL , MEMBER_GENDER , REG_DATE , TEACHER_CLASS , TEACHER_NUM , WORK_CODE FROM TEACHER AS T INNER JOIN MEMBER AS M ON T.MEMBER_ID = M.MEMBER_ID WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} ORDER BY MEMBER_NAME DESC
